sentences.english: Treatment strategies of IM were antiviral and symptomatically therapy.
sentences.chinese: 本组治疗以抗病毒和对症治疗为主。

sentences.english: Interferons (IFN) belong to the family of antivirus proteins, which can inhibit some viruses proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 干扰素是一类抗病毒蛋白，它可阻止另一种病毒增殖。

sentences.english: Sure enough they found a resistant gene.
sentences.chinese: 果然他们发现了一种抗病基因。

sentences.english: Mary has great powers of resistance and will get well quickly.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽抗病力很强，很快就会康复的。

sentences.english: Non-pathogen of rhizobacteria can induce a systemic resistance in plants.
sentences.chinese: 根际非病原细菌可诱使植物产生诱导系统抗病性。

sentences.english: Vigorous plants have thick & large leaves, strong disease resistance.
sentences.chinese: 植株生长势强，叶片宽大肥厚，抗病性强，座果率高。

sentences.english: Anti-viral agents were stopped according to the recommendations of the Asian Pacific Association for the Study of the Liver.
sentences.chinese: 根据亚洲太平洋肝脏研究协会的建议停止抗病毒药物。

sentences.english: Why are there so few effective antivirals?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有效的抗病毒药物那么少呢？

sentences.english: It's important that breeding the resistant variety to prevent the diseases.
sentences.chinese: 防治该病的主要措施是培育抗病品种。

sentences.english: So the research of cultivars resistance were received more and more closed attention.
sentences.chinese: 因此，寻找和培育持久抗病品种成为研究的热点。

sentences.english: The model plant Arabidopisis thaliana is an excellent tool for the investigation of the molecular basis of disease resistance.
sentences.chinese: 模式植物拟南芥是研究植物抗病分子基础的极好工具。

sentences.english: The evaluation of the lines resistant to SMV over three years it showed that the resistance was genetically stable.
sentences.chinese: 抗病性鉴定结果表明，获得的抗性是遗传稳定的。

sentences.english: Overusing antiviral drugs can help germs become resistant to them.
sentences.chinese: 过度使用抗病毒药会帮助病菌产生抗药性。

sentences.english: Correlated Effects of Disease and Insect Resistance and Some Important Economic Characters in Gossypium hirsutum L.
sentences.chinese: 陆地棉抗病虫性和一些重要经济性状之间的相互影响。

sentences.english: There were suitable to be cultivated in sunlight greenhouse in Xifeng District.
sentences.chinese: 抗病性强，适宜在西峰区日光温室推广种植。
